Game.Notes: Cotton Rock ‘n’ Roll retains the comical world of Cotton and Silk, the game features not only from the Cotton series but also the other shoot'em up such as Sanvein's "Time" System and Psyvariar's "Buzz" system.
Game.Title: Cotton Rock'n'Roll

Game.Notes:
A new sensation fighting game "Goonya Fighter" is now available in the arcade! !!
Seriously compete with fighters nationwide in "World Match"! !!
Let's aim for the best in the world with two types of rankings, Gachi rank and prize money rank! !!
Enjoy a 100 million yen battle in "Party Match"! !!
Walk too far and you flop over; punch the wrong way and be sent flying! And get back up again just as easily! For beginners and pros alike, welcome to a different kind of fighting game.
Game.Title: Goonya Fighter

Game.ApplicationPath: R:\ROMS-Arcade-PC-Modern\Sega APM3\Dengeki Bunko Fighting Climax Ignition APM3.zip
Game.Notes: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax IGNITION is the first major revision of DFC. DFCI added 4 new playable characters, 8 new assists, and new gameplay mechanics, among other changes. Unlike the first Dengeki Bunko, Ignition was never localized. However, an unofficial English patch for PS3 as well as a modified arcade rip with English translations and rollback netcode are available. The game was released on the following dates and platforms:
Game.Title: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition

Game.Notes:
The daughter of a vampire, Lilinor, was ravaged by vampire hunters, and she and her squire, Zasha, were on a quest to find a new stronghold. However, it was inhabited by the demons of the earlier guests...
'We'll go to the bottom level for now. Let's go take down the big guys and get the hierarchy straightened out."
The game is a retro-like stage-clearing puzzle action game that leads the vampire girl Lilinor to her goal. The game's difficulty level is very high, and the game's style is to seek a clear route after multiple challenges.
Game.Title: Nosferatu Lilinor

Game.Notes: Guilty Gear Strive is a fighting video game developed and published by Arc System Works. It is the seventh mainline installment of the Guilty Gear series, and the 25th overall. It uses Unreal Engine 4. The game was released in Japan for Sega's ALL.net platform in arcades.
Game.Title: Guilty Gear: Strive

Game.Notes:
The Future of Fighting Games Begins Today!
A malevolent force known only as Lina is devouring data from a vast, interdimensional network of servers overseen by sentient computers called ”motes.” In desperation, the motes summon heroes from a variety of parallel game worlds to face off against each other in one-on-one combat. The tournament victor has the potential to be awakened as the Blade Stranger - the savior who can vanquish Lina and protect the motes from further harm!
Developed by Studio Saizensen, Blade Strangers is a hardcore old-school fighting game. The streamlined four-button control scheme makes it easy for beginners to deal out damage from day one... but the intricate combos, counters and specials give tournament-caliber players plenty of opportunities for frame counting, chain construction and hit-box science.
Game.Title: Blade Strangers

Game.Notes: Pick one of 20 unique characters and fight your way through the dangers of the “Hollow Night”, and claim your victory over those who would get in your way. Experience intuitive and tight 2D fighter controls, with a splash of devastating combos and unique fighting styles to keep your appetite for battle sated!
Game.Title: Under Night In-Birth ExeLate[cl-r]

Game.ApplicationPath: R:\ROMS-Arcade-PC-Modern\Sega APM3\Koihime Performance Ryorai Ryorai Version 3.zip
Game.Notes: Koihime†Enbu ~Ryorairai~ (恋姫†演武 ～遼来来～) - also known as Koihime†Enbu Version 2 ~Ryorairai~ (恋姫†演武バージョン２～遼来来～), the third fighting game from the series of Koihime Musō. The arcade version was released on December 27, 2016. It also received a western localization for the PC and was made available on STEAM on July 13, 2018.
Game.Title: Koihime Enbu Ryorairai

Game.ApplicationPath: R:\ROMS-Arcade-PC-Modern\Sega APM3\The House of the Dead Scarlet Dawn.zip
Game.Notes:
House of the Dead: Scarlet Dawn is the fifth arcade game in the House of the Dead series. It takes place in 2006, between the events of The House of the Dead 4 and The House of the Dead III. The game's story follows AMS agents Kate Green and Ryan Taylor who infiltrate Scarecrow Manor just as a horde of bioengineered creatures attack. From then on they have to fight their way to safety while exploring the mansion and uncovering who is behind the outbreak.
Like in previous games in the series, the player uses a gun controller to shoot enemies as they appear on the screen. Each creature has a weak spot that deals extra damage when hit. In addition to the monsters, there are also civilians that have to be avoided. The player also has to keep track of the partner who at any time might need to be rescued. Failure to do so before time runs out leads to a life penalty. A new feature to the series is the introduction of quick-time events in which the player needs to quickly shoot a specific target. Reloading is automatic but can also be done manually by pointing outside the screen.
In addition to the main machine gun, the player can choose two more items (shotgun, grenade, rocket launcher, etc.) ahead of each level. In the Japanese version, items are bought with coins which are awarded for successful actions such as critical shots, collectibles obtained and saved civilians while in the international versions items can be chosen freely. Another Japan-exclusive feature is the use of Aime cards. They are used for storing progress, keeping collected coins, completing achievements, checking high scores and taking part in national leaderboards. Part of the Aime functionality is also a level system where players earn experience for each stage completed and are rewarded with coins for every level up.
The game has two game modes: normal mode and master mode. The normal mode is for first time players and includes assistance events. The master mode is for advanced players and has stronger and faster enemies.
Game.Title: House of the Dead: Scarlet Dawn

Game.Notes: This expanded sequel of Sound Shooting!! features all of the original game's songs along with new songs and updated gameplay. Like the original game, this blends side-scrolling arcade shooting and rhythm gameplay; this time, the rhythm game sections feature extra lanes for added difficulty.
Game.Title: Otoshu DX

Game.Notes: Puyo Puyo eSports features 24 playable characters, complete with their own distinct AI behavior and Fever drop pattern, though some of these characters simply reuse the existing AI of characters not appearing in the game as playable. These characters include fan-favorites from the original Compile game series such as Arle and Dark Prince, as well as newer characters such as Ally, who debuted in the Japan-only Nintendo 3DS game Puyo Puyo Chronicle. Everything is unlocked and saved by using using aime cards.
Game.Title: Puyo Puyo eSports

Game.Notes:
BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle is a 2D crossover fighting game developed and published by Arc System Works. It was first released on PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch and Microsoft Windows in 2018 and was out in arcades a year later.
It features characters from different franchises, including BlazBlue, Persona 4 Arena, Under Night In-Birth and RWBY. After it was released, characters from Arcana Heart, Senran Kagura and Akatsuki Blitzkampf, were added as downloadable content . The game received mostly positive reviews, with praise for the visuals, music, online functionality and mechanics.
Game.Title: BlazBlue Cross Tag Battle

Game.Notes:
Senjin Aleste features a new gameplay system compared to previous titles, with the player having access to four different ships and being able to swap between them during gameplay, with each ship having its own unique weapons. Lives are tied to the ships, with each ship counting as one life, the game ending when all four ships are lost. Downed ships are revived over time, however, indicated by four meters at the bottom corresponding to each ship.
The game features four difficulty levels: Novice, Casual, Original and Expert, with each difficulty changing the amount of bullets fired by enemies and the respawn time for downed ships.
Game.Title: Senjin Aleste

Game.Notes: Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2 is the overall twenty-third entry in the Guilty Gear series and the update title to Guilty Gear Xrd -REVELATOR-, first announced during Arc System Works Game Award in January 14, 2017.
Game.Title: Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2

Game.Notes: With its reliance on BAC, humanity had forgotten how to operate even basic transportation, let alone weapons. After the attacks from BAC and the subsequent social chaos, the human population was reduced by half. However, there was a group within Lerman Matsunaga that foresaw the dangers of a dependence on Buster Engines and the BAC that controlled them. This group led the third stage of energy development, an anti-BAC weapon developed in secret that would render Busterium inert, called the Rolling Gun. The third stage of energy development, the military package of the Rolling Gun and the mothership named the Anti-BAC Suppression Independent Control Armament "Rolling Gun" Deployment Warship RF-42R STORK was rolled out. March 18th, 2061 - "Operation Downfall" Commences The mission: to destroy BAC, which has turned Lerman Matsunaga into a fortress.
Game.Title: Rolling Gunner

Game.Notes: Pengo is an arcade game developed by Coreland and published by Sega in 1982. The player controls Pengo, a red penguin that resides in the Antarctic. The game takes place in an overhead maze made of ice blocks, where Pengo fights the patrolling, blob-like Sno-Bees. The objective of the game is for Pengo to survive a series of rounds by eliminating all Sno-Bees, while amassing bonuses by bringing together the three diamonds dispersed in the maze.
Game.Title: Pengo

Game.Notes: Umihara Kawase Fresh! released on Sega's ALL.Net P-ras MULTI version 3 in Japan in 2020. This is an adaptation of the platform game of the same name developed by Studio Saizensen and released in 2019 on Switch and PS4. Umihara Kawase is a series of platform games started in 1994 on Super Nintendo. Kawase is a young itinerant chef equipped with a fishing rod that can be used as a grappling hook, winch, bungee cord or even as a weapon to attack enemies. A new character is added to the arcade version: Super Sea Belly.
Game.Title: Umihara Kawase Fresh! For AC

Game.Notes:
A falling object puzzle with a sweets motif of beautiful girls!
-A falling block puzzle game in which cute beautiful girls appear and play against each other with a puzzle with the motif of “sweets”. If you arrange three sweets that fall from the top of the screen side by side, the sweets will disappear.
● When you hit the bottles against each other, the sweets in the bottle will break and appear. When it breaks, a chain occurs in eight directions.
● You can play in either the one-player mode or the two-player mode, which is tailored to the story.
-Cotton, the main character of the popular “Cotton Rock and Roll”, has also appeared and is used as a player character.
Game.Title: Kasiori

Game.Notes:
Dead or Alive 6 is a fighting game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo in the Dead or Alive series as a sequel to Dead or Alive 5.
New features include slow-motion moments and visible damage on the fighters during the course of the fight, while the sweat effects from Dead or Alive 5 return and are more pronounced.
An arcade version was announced in late 2018 and was released in Japan on July 18, 2019.
Game.Title: Dead or Alive 6
